summary: The agent report shows a basic understanding but lacks depth in identifying root causes and causal chains, with significant gaps in reasoning and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent failed to identify the root cause related to CM and DDR causing VCORE frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent did not capture the causal chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified some metrics but missed others.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was basic and lacked depth, failing to rule out MMDVFS correctly.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested actions were vague and lacked practical fixes.
